[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

SUpport

Working Closely Together

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” animation_style=”fade”]

When Mattermost is where work gets done it’s absolutely critical that it’s operational when your business needs it to be, which for some clients means always. Trust Brightscout to help you keep the lights on with our proactive and responsible approach.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.5″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg-ornament.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_right”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”29px|0px|104px|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]
